bitfield.description: Transmit Data. Writing this sets the TXDATAVAIL bit in the Transmit Control Register
Device specific control information for the system security logic.
Set automatically when the TX Data Register is written. Cleared automatically when the system debug logic indicates it has accepted TX Data
Receive Data. Reading this clears the RXDATAVAIL bit in the Receive Control Register
Device specific control information for the system security logic.
Set automatically when the system security logic indicates that RX Data Register is valid. Cleared automatically when the RX data register is read
